question: Which country houses the largest thermal lake in the world "Lake Heviz"?
explanation: Hungary houses the largest thermal lake in the world "Lake Heviz". Lake Heviz is located in Heviz, Hungary, near the western end of Lake Balaton. It is the largest thermal lake in the world which is available for swimming. The flow of water is powerful, and the water in the lake is completely replenished every 72 hours.
